title: Mixed Reality (MR)-Based Design Creativity Enhancement Project

context.prior_knowledge: Basic design principles and experience using 3D modeling tools
context.additional_context: A practice-centered instructional environment utilizing mixed reality (MR) equipment and digital devices.

learning_goals: Learners can improve geometric analysis skills in 3D spaces by over 30% using MR technology.
Learners can implement and evaluate creative design concepts three or more times in mixed reality environments.
Learners demonstrate design visualization and prototype development skills through MR-based PBL projects.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
